Software: BHPGM

Bayesian Hierarchical Poisson Gamma Model

Please direct any questions about this work to Jian Kang & Tim Johnson & Tom Nichols.

  • Manuscript:
    Jian Kang, Thomas E. Nichols, Tor D. Wager, Timothy D. Johnson: "A Bayesian Hierarchical Spatial Point Process Model for Multi-Type Neuroimaging Meta-Analysis." Ann. Appl. Stat. 2013;8(3):28.
    PDF | Web Appendix
  • Software - Download:
     Source code (Last updated: 01 Nov 2015) - Alpha release
    Installation instructions and how to use the software can be found in the user guide.
